name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-graph-teams-tag-nodejs
title: This is a sample application that shows the usage of Graph CRUD operations within tabs related to team tags.
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates how to perform CRUD operations on team tags using Microsoft Graph API within a Microsoft Teams tab.
longDescription: This sample application enables users to create, update, and manage team tags through Microsoft Graph API within a Teams tab. It features seamless integration with Teams Single Sign-On (SSO) and offers capabilities for managing tag members and their properties.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing gif animation for teams Tag CRUD operations.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
